title: Primetime Draven Skin Shard Disenchant/Upgrade Price bug
body:
I opened a Primetime Draven skin shard and the price it lists to disenchant and to upgrade it are at the 975 tier not the 1800 tier for a legendary skin

EDIT: i have screen shots but cant find where to embed them.

EDIT2: I tweeted it at RIOT  https://twitter.com/Notgnihtrow/status/774042919011426305

replies.body: It's a legendary skin, however, it is a permanently discounted legendary skin. It is priced at 975 RP in the store, so that's likely why it's like this for hextech crafting.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=AuA0BeKp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-09T00:28:15.329+0000)
>
> It's not a legendary skin.

why does it have the red icon and say that it is legendary then?
It's a legendary skin permanently discounted to 975 RP as a thank you to players for supporting esports. :)
